About me.Title: About me
About me.Paragraph1: Hi! My name is Marcus Vinícius Natrielli Garcia
About me.Paragraph2: I have a degree in Computer Science at UFSCar - Sorocaba campus, co-founder of the hackerspace HackoonSpace and creator of @Projeto_Hanna
About me.Paragraph3: Find out more about me and my work here on this website

Projects.Title: Projects
Projects.Paragraph: Highlights of important practical applications in my career

1.Title: Hanna Bot for Twitch
1.Description: Bot for Twitch to be used on the Projeto Hanna Hanna channel, allowing people who watch live broadcasts to have new ways of interacting and getting to know the community

2.Title: CENE Influences website
2.Description: Website of the youth ministry of the evangelical church CENE (Comunidade Evangélica Nação Eleita)

3.Title: Discord-Arduino integration
3.Description: Proof of concept integration between the Discord platform and Arduino boards (e.g. Arduino UNO), allowing two-way communication between these parties

4.Title: HackoonSpace website - V2.0
4.Description: Student entity website used to present information, links, registrations and projects in a dynamic and responsive way

5.Title: Projeto Hanna website
5.Description: Website for presenting information, news, links and activities from the Projeto Hanna community

6.Title: Projeto Hanna
6.Description: A virtual assistant (and my original character!) who was born as a bot for Discord. Little by little, it is expanding to other means, such as web and mobile applications and the launch of physical products

7.Title: Qwerty bot
7.Description: Bot for Discord based on the HackoonSpace student community mascot. It has different types of functions to make online life easier for participants

8.Title: Hacka Newsletter
8.Description: Website for registering for the HackoonSpace student community newsletter. Emails are registered on the Mailchimp platform, through an API

9.Title: Lyfer Education
9.Description: Application made during the 2nd edition of Hackathon - CCR, organized by Shawee. A game to help young Brazilians reinforce their interest in learning and discover new paths for the future

10.Title: Portfolio with Next.js
10.Description: This very website you are accessing! Made with React.js and Next.js, my personal website so that more people can get to know me and my work :D

11.Title: Java Compiler
11.Description: Project developed in the Compilers discipline at college. The program serves as a compiler from a fictional language K to the C language, going through the syntactic, lexical and semantic analysis phases

Skills.Title: Skills
Skills.Paragraph: Languages, technologies, frameworks, libraries and other skills that I use most on a daily basis as a programmer
